hero.title: Hi There & Welcome to My Corner of the Web!
hero.text: I'm **Ethan Donovan**, a web developer at Amazing Studio, dedicated to the realms of collaboration and artificial intelligence. My approach involves embracing intuition, conducting just enough research, and leveraging aesthetics as a catalyst for exceptional products. I have a profound appreciation for top-notch software, visual design, and the principles of product-led growth. Feel free to explore some of my coding endeavors on GitHub or follow me on Twitter/X.
